Question: Guang zhou C and T Industry Company Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangzhou C and T Industry Company Ltd

CES 2024 Innovation Design Gold Award winner

- Awarded the Gold Award for Innovative Design 2023-2024 at CES 2024 for the Shield Proof mobile phone case
- Made from 100% recyclable materials
- Provides military-grade 3M drop protection up to 3 meters
- Latest patented product with an anti-drop function and multi-scenario use
- Made of TPU, PC, TPE tissue material for excellent impact resistance and protection up to 3 meters military drop protection
- Continues to invest 5-10% of annual marketing expenses in product development and innovation
- Offers professional customized solutions for environmental protection products
- Focuses on sustainable development strategy and has 5 years of practical experience
- Provides flexible customization and fast delivery for brands since 2006
Summary_cn:
广州C&T工业有限公司

CES 2024创新设计金奖获得者

- 因为Shield Proof手机保护壳获得CES 2024创新设计2023-2024年度金奖
- 采用100%可回收材料制造
- 提供军用级3M防摔保护，高达3米
- 最新专利产品，具有防摔功能和多场景使用
- 采用TPU、PC、TPE组织材料制成，具有出色的抗冲击和3米军用防摔保护性能
- 持续将年度营销费用的5-10%投入到产品开发和创新中
- 为环保产品提供专业定制解决方案
- 专注于可持续发展战略，并拥有5年的实践经验
- 自2006年以来为品牌提供灵活定制和快速交付服务
